src: [start] ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? [MASK] RC : Well , um , we 'd like to go to room 17 for an appointment . Where is ... Which way should we go to get to room 17 ? [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . [MASK] LP : Do you think he 's going to take us to room 17 ? Because it looks like he 's stuck here . RC : Oh , I think so . Room 17 ... [MASK] LP : How could we ask him ? RC : It is room 17 that you 're showing us to ? ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : So everything 's fine , we can go . We have an appointment in 5 minutes , do we have time to go there ? ARI : Yes , of course . [MASK] [end] LP : Yes , my friend has forgotten his appointment time . He ca n't remember the doctor 's name either , can you help us please ? Will he ever move ? # request ( appt ( time ) ) ; request ( doctor ( name ) ) ARI : I 'm going to call a nurse to come and inform you . Do you have any other questions ? # call-nurse ( ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : We 'll wait for the nurse . ARI : Yes . # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you , goodbye . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) RC : Goodbye . # bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LP : Where is room 17 ? # request ( location ( room_17 ) ) [start] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . [MASK] RC : How do I get to room 17 ? Do I have to take the lift ? [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] LP : How long before my appointment ? [MASK] RC : ARI , can you ... sorry ... He is n't responding . [MASK] RC : ARI ? ARI : I 'll call a nurse to come and inform you . [MASK] [end] RC : ARI , I do n't have a watch , is there a clock in the room so I can find out the time ? # request ( time ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . # cant-help ( ) ; suggest ( going-to ( reception ) )

src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LC : Hello , so what do we need to find as ... [MASK] RP : So I think yes , we 'll ask him you want is there a cafeteria or a place where we can eat . [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] LC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] RP : Okay , perfect . [MASK] RP : Do you want to have a coffee before your appointment ? [MASK] LC : Yes , since we have half an hour before the appointment we can have something . [MASK] RP : Perfect , let 's go then . LC : Ok . RP : Ok , we 'll take it slowly , we 'll get there . LC : Yes . [MASK] RP : So we can ask where the counter is to get a coffee ? [MASK] LC : Yes . [MASK] RP : Ok. [MASK] LC : Umm ... Where exactly do you go for a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] [end] RP : We 'll ask him again . RP : Umm ... We 're looking for the cafeteria . # request ( location ( cafe ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) RP : Yes well thank you . # acknowledge ( ) ; thank ( ) RP : However , he was n't able to tell us if there was a special counter for coffees , it does n't matter .

src: LC : Well , the treatment was , well the appointment was very quick . I 'd love a coffee now . Do you know where I could get one ? # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) [start] RP : Um hello , we 'd like a coffee . Can you please tell us where to go to get a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : Ok , well thank you very much . [MASK] LC : So we 'll take the lift back down , is that right ? [MASK] RP : Do you have to take the lift to go back down ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . [MASK] RP : Can you tell us where the lift is ? [MASK] [end] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( lifts ) )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] RC : Well , shall we go and eat ? [MASK] LP : I think ... [MASK] LP : It 's my first time here and I 'm a bit lost , I 'd like to find ... I think I need to go to the toilet before starting because afterwards I have an appointment with the doctor . Could you tell me ... I must use informal register . Could you , could you tell me how to find the toilets , please ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] ARI : Can I help you ? [MASK] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? [MASK] RC : So we 'd like to go and eat , is there a cafeteria here ? [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : And how do we get there ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Ok. [MASK] RC : Before we go to the cafeteria , I 'd like to go to the toilet . Where are the toilets ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] RC : So what do we do , shall we go ? [MASK] [end] LP : I really need to go to the toilet . # request ( location ( toilet ) ) ARI : I did n't understand your request , could you rephrase it ? # r-paraph ( request ( location ( toilet ) ) ARI : How can I help you ? # offer-help ( ) RC : We would like to go to the toilets . # request ( location ( toilet ) ) LP : Could you please come with me to the toilets ? # request ( guide-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LP : I would like to go to the toilet . # request ( location ( toilet ) )
